definitions.definition: a particular way of doing something

definitions.definition: the quality of being well planned and organized

examples.text: There's very little method in his approach.

wordOrigin: late Middle English (in the sense ‘prescribed medical treatment for a disease’): via Latin from Greek methodos ‘pursuit of knowledge’, from meta- (expressing development) + hodos ‘way’.
